descriptions:
Introducing our beautifully crafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box, made from high-quality cedar wood and designed for outdoor use. This charming nesting box is expertly constructed with a combination of glue and nails, ensuring durability and longevity. The unique feature of a burned image of a squirrel on the wall adds a delightful touch to the design, making it a lovely addition to any outdoor space.

With a removable roof for easy cleaning and hanging, this nesting box offers convenience and practicality. Plus, it comes with two screws and washers for hassle-free mounting, so you can easily install it in your desired location. The generous dimensions provide ample space for squirrels to make themselves at home, with a 3.5-inch opening specifically designed for their comfort.

Add a touch of nature to your backyard and provide a safe and cozy home for your local wildlife with our Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Get yours today and create a welcoming haven for these delightful creatures in your outdoor space.

Introducing our beautiful and functional Squirrel House/Nesting Box, crafted from high-quality cedar wood for durability and a natural aesthetic. Designed for outdoor use, this charming box is expertly constructed with a combination of glued and nailed joints, ensuring sturdiness and longevity. 

Featuring a unique burned image of a squirrel on the exterior, created by talented artist Drew Senesac, this nesting box adds a decorative touch to any outdoor space. The removable roof allows for easy cleaning and convenient hanging, while the included mounting hardware (two screws and washers) makes installation a breeze.

With outside dimensions of 12x11x10 inches and inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches, this nesting box provides ample space for squirrels to make themselves at home. The 3.5-inch squirrel opening ensures easy access for our furry friends.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to provide a cozy and attractive nesting space for squirrels in your outdoor area. Add our Squirrel House/Nesting Box to your garden or yard today!

The removable roof allows for easy cleaning and hanging, and the box comes with two screws and washers for convenient mounting. The inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches provide ample space for nesting, while the 3.5-inch squirrel opening ensures a cozy and secure home for your furry friends.

Don't miss out on this stylish and functional addition to your outdoor space. Order our Squirrel House/Nesting Box today and create a welcoming sanctuary for your local wildlife.
